text: Alprazolam, better known by its trade name Xanax, is a short-acting drug. The drug is made to treat people who get panic attacks or other anxiety disorders. Alprazolam is the most commonly misused benzodiazepine (the drug's class) in the United States; but the majority of prescribed users do not develop a substance-use disorder. Alprazolam is a prescription drug in the United States. ==References== Category:Psychoactive drugs Category:Organonitrogen compounds Category:Organochlorides
title: Alprazolam
